name: Srudug!
description:
Here's an entry for the #LOWREZJAM2016.

The day is a final day of Battle Ram Tournament in Macan Gedhe Village. Garut the agilest ram versus Keling the strongest ram, who will win?

GARUT's CONTROLS

  • Z - Attack (when cooldown is over)
  • X - Evade (when cooldown is over)

KELING's CONTROLS

  • X - Attack (when cooldown is over)
  • Z - Evade (when cooldown is over)

CREDITS

  • Engine: Construct 2
  • Art and Eventing: Tamarindus Indica (Masrinduz)
  • Music: Tio Allin Subiantoro (TheoAllen) & Jeepunk
